description: Campaigners including Greta Thunberg want Federer to end a sponsorship deal with Credit Suisse.
title: Federer responds to climate change critics over Credit Suisse links
title_page: Federer responds to climate change critics over Credit Suisse links - BBC News
maintext: For its part, Credit Suisse has said it is "seeking to align its loan portfolios with the objectives of the Paris Agreement [to combat climate change] and has recently announced in the context of its global climate strategy that it will no longer invest in new coal-fired power plants".
